Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Mkhumbuleni uAllâh ngeentsuku ezityunjiweyo67 kodwa lowo uthe wangxamela ukugoduka iintsuku zisembini, akukho sono kuye nalowo uthe wahlala, akukho sono kuye, ukuba iinjongo zakhe kukwenza okulungileyo nokuthobela uAllâh. Nazi kananjalo okokuba niya kuqokelelwa nonke nimiswe phambi kwaKhe
Ebantwini (apha) kukho lowo untetho yakhe ingakwenza ukholwe nguye kobu bomi balo mhlaba, ade abize uAllâh ukuba Abe liNgqina mayela noko kusentliziyweni yakhe, kodwa ungoyena uthanda ingxwabangxwaba
Naxa emka (kuwe wena Muhammad) imizamo yakhe kukwenza ubutshinga emhlabeni, nokutshabalalisa izityalo nemfuyo kanti uAllâh Akabuthandi ubutshinga
Kuthikusakuthiwakuye:“Yoyika uAllâh”, isukeinkukhumalo imtsalele kulwaphulo-mthetho ngakumbi. Okumfanele ngokwaneleyo yena sisiHogo, enjani yona ukubambi indawo yokuphumla
Ebantwini (apha) kukho lowo ungada athengise ngobomi bakhe, ngenxa yokukholisa uAllâh kwaye uAllâh UnoBubele kwizicaka (zaKhe)
Hini na nina bakholwayo! Ngenani kwi-Islam ngokupheleleyo ningalandeli ikhondo likaShaytân. Inene yena ulutshaba ngokuselubala kuni
Ukuba nithe nakreqa emva kokuba imiqondiso ecacileyo ifikile kuni, yazini ke ngoko okokuba uAllâh nguSomandla, uSobulumko
Ingaba balindele nto yimbi na ngaphandle kwale yokuba uAllâh Eza kusuka Abafikele Ekumathunzi amafu neengelosi? Xa kunjalo ke makube ityala sele ligwetyiwe yaye yonke imicimbi ibuyela kuAllâh
